title: The Self-Reinforcing Product Ecosystem Theory
summary: Organizations like Яндекс build product ecosystems where products leverage the organization's core technologies and even themselves to improve and expand their functionality, creating a self-reinforcing cycle of growth and innovation.

key_relationships.description: Indicates that Яндекс Музыка is a product within the Яндекс ecosystem.
Indicates that Яндекс Пэй uses itself, suggesting a self-improving system.
Indicates that Яндекс uses itself, suggesting a self-improving system.

evidence.relevance: Demonstrates the product ecosystem centered on Яндекс.

evidence.text: Technology as an Enabler (narrative): A technology entity (нейросеть) likely enables or supports the functionality of product entities
evidence.relevance: Supports the idea of technology as an enabler within the ecosystem.

alternative_explanations.summary: The observed patterns are simply the result of independent product development efforts within Яндекс, without a deliberate ecosystem strategy.

gaps: The specific ways in which нейросеть is used by different products within the Яндекс ecosystem.
Quantitative data on the performance improvements resulting from self-referential technology use.
The degree of integration and data sharing between different products within the Яндекс ecosystem.

title: The Controlled Innovation Silo Theory
summary: Organizations strategically isolate innovation within specific product lines, leveraging core technologies in a controlled manner. This approach prioritizes focused development and risk mitigation over broad, interconnected ecosystem growth, resulting in self-contained improvements and limited cross-pollination between products.

evidence.relevance: Supports the organizational structure aspect of the theory, showing that Яндекс Музыка is part of Яндекс, but doesn't imply functional integration.
Supports the idea of focused improvement within a specific product line, as Яндекс Пэй uses itself.

evidence.text: Multiple product entities are 'part_of' a central organization
evidence.relevance: Supports the organizational structure aspect of the theory, showing that multiple products are part of Яндекс, but doesn't imply functional integration.

gaps: The degree of technology sharing between product lines is unknown.
The specific reasons for limiting technology deployment are not identified.
The impact of siloed innovation on overall organizational performance is unclear.
